title: Frankfurt Glamour in Opera District with Cocktail Bar & Swimming Pool
description:
Experience the charm of Frankfurt with a stay at this prestigious MICHELIN Keys recognised hotel, located in the heart of the city's Opera Quarter. This opulent property is a stone's throw from the grand Alte Oper and the bustling Goethestrasse shopping street, offering a prime location for culture and retail enthusiasts.

Indulge in the hotel's luxurious amenities, including a state-of-the-art fitness centre and Sofitel Spa offering a range of rejuvenating treatments. For gastronomic delights, visit Restaurant Schönemann, serving a fusion of local and international cuisine, or enjoy a refreshing drink at Lili's Bar overlooking the vibrant cityscape.
offer_address: Opernplatz 16, Hochstraße 44, Frankfurt am Main 60313, Germany
